alert.note: Alert for Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 08 at 6:01AM EDT until September 08 at 6:45AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 AM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN JEFFERSON AND CENTRAL MADISON COUNTIES... At 601 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles northwest of Madison, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Madison, Greenville, Lee, Lovett, Moseley Hall, Hopewell, Cherry Lake, Hamburg, Hanson, Pinetta, and Ashville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
